properties.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range/East Lake County Above 11000 Ft; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys
properties.headline: Avalanche Warning issued February 7 at 5:41AM MST by NWS Denver CO
properties.description:
THE FOLLOWING MESSAGE IS TRANSMITTED AT THE REQUEST OF THE
COLORADO AVALANCHE INFORMATION CENTER.

AVALANCHE WARNING FOR THE CAIC ASPEN, GUNNISON, AND SAWATCH ZONES

* TIMING...Beginning 5:00 AM Friday February 7. Expires at 8:00 AM
Saturday February 8.

* AFFECTED AREA... Elk Mountains...Hardscrabble Mountains...Red
Table...Ruby Range...West Elk Mountains...Mosquito Range...Sawatch
Range

* AVALANCHE DANGER...The avalanche danger is HIGH (Level 4 of 5).
Avalanches large enough to bury and kill a person are likely
Friday into Saturday morning. Many avalanche will run naturally.
You can trigger avalanches from the bottom of slopes or from a
distance. If you trigger an avalanche it will be large and very
dangerous.

* REASON... Intense snowfall and strong winds will result in very
dangerous avalanche conditions.
properties.instruction:
is not recommended.

Consult www.colorado.gov/avalanche for detailed information.

Lazar
